name: Newsletter Confirmation Email
description: Confirmation email sent when someone subscribes to your newsletter. Includes welcome message and what to expect.

defaultSections.title: Welcome to {newsletterName}!
defaultSections.subtitle: You're now subscribed to our newsletter

paragraphs: Thanks for subscribing to {newsletterName}! We're excited to have you in our community.

sections.title: üîî No Spam
sections.content: We respect your inbox. You can unsubscribe anytime.

variables.name: firstName
variables.aiInstructions: Use the subscriber's first name from the database. If not available, use a friendly generic greeting.

variables.name: newsletterName
variables.aiInstructions: Use the newsletter's brand name from organization settings

variables.name: emailFrequency
variables.description: How often subscribers will receive emails
variables.aiInstructions: Specify the email frequency (e.g., 'Every Monday', 'Twice a month', 'Weekly')

variables.name: contentDescription
variables.defaultValue: industry insights, tips, and exclusive resources
variables.aiInstructions: Describe the type of content subscribers can expect (be specific and enticing)

variables.name: exclusiveContent
variables.defaultValue: early access to new products, special discounts, and member-only content
variables.aiInstructions: Highlight subscriber benefits and exclusive perks

variables.name: additionalMessage
variables.defaultValue: We're glad you're here. Feel free to reply to this email if you have any questions or feedback.
variables.aiInstructions: Add a warm, personal touch. Encourage engagement or provide helpful next steps.

variables.name: senderName
variables.description: Name of the person/team sending the email
variables.aiInstructions: Use the sender's name from organization settings or the newsletter editor's name

variables.name: ctaText
variables.aiInstructions: Create an engaging CTA that encourages immediate action (e.g., 'Read Latest Articles', 'Explore Resources', 'Update Preferences')

variables.name: ctaUrl
variables.aiInstructions: Link to the newsletter archive, blog, or preference center

variables.name: companyAddress
variables.defaultValue: 123 Main Street, Suite 100, City, State 12345, USA

variables.name: unsubscribeUrl
variables.aiInstructions: Generate the unsubscribe URL with subscriber token

previewData.contentDescription: curated industry news, actionable tips, and exclusive interviews
previewData.exclusiveContent: early access to new features, special discounts, and VIP community access
previewData.additionalMessage: We're thrilled to have you join our community of 10,000+ subscribers. Reply to this email anytime - we read every message!
